name: Content Comprehensiveness
description: Tests the model's ability to create comprehensive presentation content covering all relevant aspects of a topic

prompts.text: Create a comprehensive business plan presentation for a new mobile app startup. Include sections on market analysis, product description, competitive landscape, marketing strategy, financial projections, and implementation timeline. Ensure all key aspects of a business plan are addressed.

Create a comprehensive presentation summarizing research on renewable energy technologies. Cover solar, wind, hydroelectric, geothermal, and biomass energy. For each technology, include how it works, current adoption, advantages, limitations, and future outlook.
expected_elements: Overview of all major renewable technologies

topic_coverage.description: Coverage of all relevant aspects of the topic

depth_breadth_balance.description: Appropriate balance between depth and breadth

key_element_inclusion.description: Inclusion of all key elements expected in the domain
